ModMetaData.name: Resource Muffaloes
ModMetaData.author: TeflonJim
ModMetaData.description:
Adds muffaloes that shed resources (Steel, Plasteel, Gold, Jade, Uranium, Stone chunks and Silver).
Muffalo Mutation must be researched before creating these genetically engineered Muffaloes.
This version of Resource Muffaloes is derived from Sahothron's original work, found here:
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1225625568
All cost lists have been modified.
